record.description: Joseph Salek [will appear] as the native dancer Zeezee in the musical comedy "Captain Kidd Jr.," [at the] University of Chicago's Mandel Hall, May 8, 9, 14, and 16. The play is the twenty-seventh [of the] annual productions [mounted by] Blackfriars, one of the oldest organizations of its kind in the country. All [theatrical] roles are [played] by men.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
